name: ActorLookup
0:
”Alexa, ask Actor Lookup what movies are Will Smith known for”
”Alexa, open Actor Lookup and give me a movie that Tom Hanks is in”
”Alexa, ask Actor Lookup what movies were popular in 2017”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: actor lookup
des:
This skill aims to assist you in figuring out what movies actors and actresses starred in. This skill also gives you a list of popular movies for a given year. 

By using an API from TheMovieDB.org , you are able to search thousands of actors and actresses! Future features will allow you to lookup which actors were in a particular movie.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
